title: I wish there was a fun & short game mode for casual players
body:
Time low and the only thing there is aram which is either dull bc u got a crappy champ or dull bc ur beating them too hard or fun bc u got a matchup with people who make it fun. And there's normal where u have to take the effort to pick a role.
Well something like ascension fits the description

replies.body:
While the game has 3v3 (around 20 min per match) or Dominion (which can take as fast as 5 min, or 20 min max).

But too bad we don't have them here on OCE.
just play a custom or ai.
ascension was really boring. URF was the mode to beat, as much as some champions stomped, we still loved to see Thresh permahooking someone begging for mercy in all chat.
Showdown was fun with the 1v1 and 2v2 matches. Loading screen took longer than the actual matches. Hope they bring it back :)
